translation.zh: 20分钟后报告希尔斯顿的提案

translation.en: Both feet in today, okay, Miles?

translation.en: I don't have anything. Just... I need a little more time.
translation.zh: 我什么主意也没有那个… 我还需要一点时间

translation.en: I just need a couple of days.
You've been a pleasant surprise lately.
translation.zh: 你最近的表现意外地好

translation.en: Be a pal, pass these out.
translation.zh: 朋友 帮忙把这些发了

translation.en: Pal, take one, pass it down.
translation.zh: 朋友 拿一个 传下去

translation.en: But how about we refresh their...

translation.zh: 你这是怎么了啊 哥们？

translation.en: I mean, you used to hide behind interns, but now you're... you're so you.
translation.zh: 你以前都躲到实习生背后但现在却变得这么喜欢表现自我

translation.en: I don't know, one day I just decided
translation.zh: 我也不知道 有一天我突然决定了

translation.en: to start looking people in the eye and tell 'em,
translation.zh: 要开始正视别人的眼睛 告诉他们：

translation.en: And so, now you can just magically sell Pool
translation.zh: 所以现在你就能神奇地说服普尔接受

translation.en: on something as ridiculous as those glasses?
translation.zh: 像这些眼镜这般荒谬的东西了？
Oculus眼镜很牛逼的 大哥

translation.en: Okay, okay. Hey, hey. You... you really wanna know my secret?
translation.zh: 好吧 你真想知道我的秘密？

translation.en: Your secret is you paid for a handjob?
translation.zh: 你的秘密就是你花钱请人打飞机？

translation.en: body, soul. You have to be recommended by a previous client,
translation.zh: 全身 灵魂 只有靠客户推荐你才能去

translation.en: Mm. So, how'd you get in?
And it is coin, I'm not shitting you.
translation.zh: 他们用的是创新科技 我没骗你

translation.en: So why are you telling me?
-When one succeeds, we all succeed. -Oh, come-- Bullshit.
translation.zh: -你的成功 就是我们大家的成功-少来了… 胡说八道

translation.en: Okay, look, I get a 10% referral fee.
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 我能拿10%的推荐费

translation.en: I'm not exactly worried about the competition.
translation.zh: 我一点也不担心你这个竞争对手

translation.en: I'll be up in a minute.
[Hugh] Good morning, Mr. Elliott. This is South Hill Fertility Center
translation.zh: 早上好 艾略特先生这里是南山生殖中心

translation.en: calling to confirm your appointment for today.
translation.zh: 打来确认您今天的预约

translation.en: [Hugh] Let me guess, Mr. Elliott. Another reschedule?
translation.zh: 让我猜猜 艾略特先生 又要改时间？

translation.en: We're never gonna be able to make a baby
translation.zh: 如果你连第一次预约都不去

translation.en: if you won't keep your first appointment. It's like...
translation.zh: 我们这样永远也生不出孩子的
-价格太贵了 你知道嘛-这个嘛

translation.en: Well, then, what else have we been saving for?
translation.zh: 我们存钱不就是为了这个吗？

translation.en: I mean... And, you know, your work will pick up.
translation.zh: 你知道嘛 你的工作会走上坡的

translation.en: You know, a sperm analysis is nothing to be ashamed of.
translation.zh: 你知道嘛精液分析不是什么丢人的事
天啊 我们能不能别…

translation.en: Let's just talk about it later, all right? I don't...
translation.zh: 我们晚点再谈这件事 好吗？我不想…

translation.en: Let's not ruin a nice morning.
translation.zh: 别毁了这个美好的早晨

translation.en: Yeah, I wouldn't want to ruin this nice morning we're having.
translation.zh: 是啊 我可不想毁了我们这个“美好的早晨”

translation.en: Don't know how many more of these nice mornings I can take.
translation.zh: 都不知道我还能再忍多少个这样“美好的早晨”

translation.en: -Where do we keep the light bulbs again? -[cell phone chimes]
translation.zh: 我们灯泡放在哪儿来着？

translation.en: Uh, I don't know. The laundry room maybe?
translation.zh: 呃 我不知道 也许是在洗衣房？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Hi. I'd, uh, like to make an appointment, please?
translation.zh: 呃… 那个 你好 我想预约水疗
天啊 我这是在干什么？
欢迎来到顶级快乐水疗馆
-刚才外面那个是汤姆·布雷迪吗？-抱歉

translation.en: client confidentiality is our number-one priority.
translation.zh: 对客户机密的保护是我们的头等大事

translation.en: Dan Grannam. I work with him.
translation.zh: 丹·格兰南 我跟他共事

translation.en: Ah, yes. Did he tell you about Top Happy, the process?
translation.zh: 啊 这样啊 他有没有告诉你顶级快乐的流程是怎样的？
为我们带来了诸多困难
旧的身体 旧的化学物质

translation.en: rebuild your DNA better than ever.
translation.zh: 将你的DNA重建 变得比以前更好

translation.en: Is there a reason I'm wearing a diaper?
translation.zh: 给我穿条尿裤是有什么原因吗？

translation.en: What kind of farm doesn't have a clothesline?
translation.zh: 这农场怎么没有晾衣绳啊？

translation.en: What are you doing, you dumb shit?
translation.zh: 你这是在干什么 你个傻逼？

translation.en: [heavy breathing] Let's see if this thing worked.
[Miles] What time do you have to be at work in the morning?

translation.zh: 我不知道 跟往常一样

translation.en: [Miles] Do you want any water from the fridge? I need to hydrate.
translation.zh: 要我给你从冰箱拿点水来吗？我需要补充水分

translation.en: [Kate] No, it's okay, I'm just trying to sleep.
translation.zh: 不 不用了 我只是想睡觉而已
迈尔斯 是撞到书柜了吗？

translation.en: [Kate] Are you okay? Do I need to come down?

translation.zh: -不 我没事-不 我没事

translation.en: -What are you? -I don't want any trouble.
translation.zh: -你是个什么东西？-我不想惹麻烦

translation.en: I would just like you to leave my house, please.
translation.zh: 我只想… 我想请你离开我的家

translation.en: In fact, what are you even doing here?
translation.zh: 而且 你到底在这里干嘛？

translation.en: I live here. I live here!
translation.zh: 我住在这里 我才住在这里！

translation.en: -Take it easy. Take it easy. -What's happening?
That's what I'd like to know.
That's what I'd like to know.
-That's what I'd like to know. -The only thing I know
translation.zh: -这事我也想知道-我只知道我本来

translation.en: is that I was upstairs with my wife.
translation.zh: 是在楼上跟我妻子在一起

translation.en: And now I'm being attacked by someone who looks like me...
translation.zh: 我被一个跟我长得一样的人攻击了…

translation.en: is that I went to a spa.
I woke up in a grave...
find whatever the fuck you are upstairs with my wife.
translation.zh: 发现你这个东西在楼上跟我妻子一起

translation.en: I woke up in a spa,
translation.zh: 我就是在水疗馆醒来的

translation.en: but then I went to work,
You might want to put on some clothes.
translation.zh: 你最好先穿几件衣服再说
是啊 你可以从洗衣房里借几件我的穿

translation.en: some of mine in the laundry room.
translation.zh: 你可以从洗衣房里借几件我的穿

translation.en: [New Miles] There are shoes by the front door.
[New Miles] I'm just gonna leave Kate a note.
translation.zh: 我去给凯特留一张纸条

translation.en: I'm drinking lemonade, waiting for my mom to pick me up. What happened?
translation.zh: 我喝着柠檬水等我妈来接我时 发生了什么？
嗯？不知道了吧 你看？

translation.en: A bee stung me on the eyebrow.
translation.zh: 一只蜜蜂蛰了我的眉毛这里

translation.en: It felt like a hot needle.
translation.zh: 感觉像被一根烫的针扎了

translation.en: Lake Valley overnight, seven minutes in heaven.
translation.zh: 湖谷过夜派对上 “天堂七分钟”游戏

translation.en: I couldn't undo the bra strap of...
-Oh, uh... -She told the whole school about it.
I know, I know. I know she did. What, um...
translation.zh: 我知道 她说了 那个…

translation.en: -Yeah. See, not so easy, is it? -Okay. No, no, I-I know it. It's um...
translation.zh: -嗯 你看 没那么简单 不是么？-不 我记得的 是叫…
-艾伦 呃 艾伦 嗯…-什么？

translation.en: Yeah. Always looked at you like she hated you.
translation.zh: 对 看你的时候总是一幅恨死你的样子

translation.en: God, I know. She had that uptight preppy thing going on, right?
translation.zh: 天啊 对吧 她总是一副紧张兮兮的好学生样儿 对吧？

translation.en: When was the last time you...
If you're that desperate, I'll give you a tug job.
translation.zh: 你们这么猴急的话我给你们打飞机吧

translation.en: People are not ready for this.
translation.zh: 人们还没有做好准备接受

translation.en: Reproductive cloning is still illegal in 187 countries.
translation.zh: 生殖性克隆在187个国家依旧是违法的
再加上微突触记忆移植

translation.en: There you go. You hit the nail right on the head.
translation.zh: 对呀 你这话说的一阵见血

translation.en: Well, what were you planning on doing with the original me?
translation.zh: 那你们打算对原来的我做什么？

translation.en: we wouldn't have to do it this way.
translation.zh: 我们是没必要动用这个手段的

translation.en: Ideally we grind then dissolve in acid solution,
translation.zh: 理想状况下我们会碾碎了然后用酸液溶解掉
但我们的机器出了点问题

translation.en: The difficulties of getting parts from Korea, you wouldn't believe.
translation.zh: 从韩国进机器零件的难度呀说了你也不相信

translation.en: So, for now, we bury the de-activees in the state forest.
translation.zh: 所以我们只好暂且把失活体埋在州立森林里

translation.en: We are very upset about this.
You are the first to survive the deactivation.
translation.zh: 你是第一个在失活过程中存活下来的

translation.en: Hold up. Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey!
You... You were just gonna kill me?
translation.zh: 你们是打算就这样杀了我？

translation.en: No. We'd harvest your organ first.
translation.zh: 不是 我们会先收割了你的器官
最好看看你的肾还在不在 对吧？

translation.en: Laughter is the spice of life.

translation.zh: 所以 你是在开玩笑？
我们向您致以最真诚的歉意

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry, but you know what? Somehow that seems a little insufficient.
translation.zh: 哦 真抱歉 但你猜怎么着我觉得道歉好像有一点点不够

translation.en: I mean, at the minimum... [stammers] the minimum,

translation.zh: -对不起 不能退款 公司政策-嘿！

translation.en: Are you gonna add anything to this, huh? Are you just gonna sit there?
translation.zh: 你… 你打算说几句吗 嗯？还是你就打算傻坐在这里？

translation.en: This isn't real, right? I mean, this is some kind of trick.
translation.zh: 这不是真的 对吧？ 这肯定是个恶作剧

translation.en: All right, little detail you might have noticed.
translation.zh: 好吧 有一点小细节你们可能也注意到了

translation.en: There's two of us, but there is one home, there's one car, one life.
translation.zh: 现在有我们两个人但只有一个家 一辆车 一段生活

translation.en: So, what do you suggest we do?
translation.zh: 所以 你们建议我们怎么办？

translation.en: Okay, here's what we can do.
translation.zh: 好吧 这是我们能做到的
如果你能推荐新客户的话
